item.title: Event-Driven Architecture in .NET with RabbitMQ
item.description: Learn how to implement flexible and resilient event-driven systems in .NET using RabbitMQ as a message broker with practical code examples for producers and consumers. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/event-driven-architecture-in-dotnet-with-rabbitmq
